item.title: FFmpeg脚本
item.description: 脚本基于Windows10系统设计 查看软件版本 1D:\ffmpeg\bin>ver 2 3Microsoft Windows [版本 10.0.18362.356] 4 5D:\ffmpeg\bin>ffmpeg.exe -version 6 7ffmpeg version N-94600-g661a9b274b Copyright (c) 2000-2019 the FFmpeg developers 8built with gcc 9.1.1 (GCC) 20190807 9configuration: --enable-gpl --enable-version3 --enable-sdl2 --enable-fontconfig --enable-gnutls --enable-iconv --enable-libass --enable-libdav1d --enable-libbluray --enable-li 10bfreetype --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libopencore-amrnb --enable-libopencore-amrwb --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopus --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr
